## Library Tidyverse

```{r tidyverse, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Installing penguin package

```{r df_create, echo=FALSE}
install.packages("palmerpenguins")
```
## Loading penguin dataset

```{r df_create, echo=FALSE}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```
